thread.title: Police: Motorcyclist killed while racing car in Birmingham
thread.title_full: Police: Motorcyclist killed while racing car in Birmingham

title: Police: Motorcyclist killed while racing car in Birmingham
text:
Police: Motorcyclist killed while racing car in Birmingham By - Associated   
BIRMINGHAM, Ala. (AP) - Authorities say a motorcycle rider has died after crashing while racing a car. 
Birmingham Lt. Sean Edwards says the motorcyclist lost control of his vehicle Sunday afternoon and crashed into a utility pole. He died at the scene. 
Authorities say two people, including the driver of the car the motorcyclist was racing, were held for questioning. 
Edwards says police are working to obtain surveillance camera footage. 
The name of the motorcyclist has not yet been released, as of Sunday evening.
